50 #ifndef __6_PAR_SOLVE_H__
51 #define __6_PAR_SOLVE_H__
52 
53 #include "6par_gamma.h"
54 #include "6par_newton.h"
55 #include "lib_util.h"
56 
57 class notification_interface
58 {
59 public:
60  virtual bool notify( int iter, double x[], double resid[], const int n ) = 0;
61 };
62 
63 static double to_double(double x) { return x; }
64 
65 template<typename Real>
66 bool solve6par_callback( int iter, Real x[], Real resid[], const int n, void *data)
67 {
68  if ( n != 6 ) return false;
69 
70  if ( notification_interface *nif = static_cast<notification_interface*>(data) )
71  {
72  double xd[6];
73  double rd[6];
74 
75  for (int i=0;i<6;i++)
76  {
77  xd[i] = to_double( x[i] );
78  rd[i] = to_double( resid[i] );
79  }
80 
81  return nif->notify( iter, xd, rd, 6 );
82  }
83  else
84  return true;
85 }
86 
87 template< typename Real >
88 class __Module6ParNonlinear
89 {
90 private:
91  notification_interface *m_notifyInterface;
92  Real Vmp, Imp, Voc, Isc, bVoc, aIsc, gPmp, Egref, Tref;
93 
94 public:
95 
96  __Module6ParNonlinear( notification_interface *nif,
97  double _Vmp, double _Imp, double _Voc, double _Isc,
98  double _bVoc, double _aIsc, double _gPmp, double _Egref, double _Tref )
99  : m_notifyInterface(nif),
100  Vmp(_Vmp), Imp(_Imp),
101  Voc(_Voc), Isc(_Isc),
102  bVoc(_bVoc), aIsc(_aIsc), gPmp(_gPmp),
103  Egref(_Egref), Tref(_Tref)
104  {
105  }
106 
107  void operator() ( const Real x[6], Real f[6] )
108  {
109  Real a = x[0];
110  Real Il = x[1];
111  Real Io = x[2];
112  Real Rs = x[3];
113  Real Rsh = x[4];
114  Real Adj = x[5];
115 
116  f[0] = Il - Io*( exp( Isc*Rs / a ) - 1 ) - Isc*Rs/Rsh - Isc;
117  f[1] = Io*( exp( Voc/a ) - 1 ) + Voc/Rsh -Il;
118  f[2] = Il - Io*( exp( (Vmp + Imp*Rs) / a ) - 1 ) - (Vmp + Imp*Rs)/Rsh - Imp;
119 
120  f[3] = Imp - Vmp*(
121  ( Io/a*exp( (Vmp + Imp*Rs)/a ) + 1/Rsh )
122  /( 1 + Io*Rs/a*exp( (Vmp + Imp*Rs)/a ) + Rs/Rsh ) );
123 
124  const Real dT = 5;
125 
126  const Real aT = a*(Tref+dT)/Tref;
127  const Real VocT = bVoc*(1+Adj/100.0)*dT + Voc;
128  const Real Eg = (1-0.0002677*dT)*Egref;
129  const Real IoT = Io*pow( (Tref+dT)/Tref, 3)*exp( 11600 * (Egref/Tref - Eg/(Tref+dT)));
130 
131  f[4] = Il+aIsc*(1-Adj/100)*dT - IoT*(exp( VocT/aT ) - 1 ) - VocT/Rsh;
132 
133 
134  Real gamma = 0;
135  mod6par_gamma_approx<Real>( &gamma, Io, Il, a, aIsc, Adj, Vmp, Imp, Rs, Rsh, Egref, Tref );
136 
137  f[5] = gamma - gPmp;
138  }
139 
140  bool exec(Real &_a, Real &_Il, Real &_Io, Real &_Rs, Real &_Rsh, Real &_Adj,
141  int max_iter, double tol, notification_interface *nif )
142  {
143  Real x[6], resid[6];
144 
145  x[0] = _a;
146  x[1] = _Il;
147  x[2] = _Io;
148  x[3] = _Rs;
149  x[4] = _Rsh;
150  x[5] = _Adj;
151 
152  bool check = false;
153  int niter = newton<Real, __Module6ParNonlinear, 6>( x, resid, check, *this,
154  max_iter, Real(tol), Real(tol), 0.7,
155  solve6par_callback<Real>, nif );
156 
157  if ( niter < 0 || check ) return false;
158 
159  _a = x[0];
160  _Il = x[1];
161  _Io = x[2];
162  _Rs = x[3];
163  _Rsh = x[4];
164  _Adj = x[5];
165 
166  return true;
167  }
168 };
169 
170 class module6par
171 {
172 public:
173  enum { monoSi, multiSi, CdTe, CIS, CIGS, Amorphous };
174 
175  module6par()
176  : Type(monoSi), Vmp(0), Imp(0), Voc(0), Isc(0), bVoc(0), aIsc(0), gPmp(0), Nser(0), Tref(0),
177  a(0.0), Il(0.0), Io(0.0), Rs(0.0), Rsh(0.0), Adj(0.0) { }
178 
179  module6par( int _type, double _vmp, double _imp, double _voc, double _isc, double _bvoc, double _aisc, double _gpmp, int _nser, double _Tref )
180  : Type(_type), Vmp(_vmp), Imp(_imp), Voc(_voc), Isc(_isc), bVoc(_bvoc), aIsc(_aisc), gPmp(_gpmp), Nser(_nser), Tref(_Tref),
181  a(0.0), Il(0.0), Io(0.0), Rs(0.0), Rsh(0.0), Adj(0.0) { }
182 
183  std::string Name;
184  std::string Tech;
185 
186  int Type;
187  double Vmp, Imp;
188  double Voc, Isc;
189  double bVoc, aIsc, gPmp;
190  int Nser;
191 
192  double Tref;
193 
194  double a, Il, Io, Rs, Rsh, Adj;
195 
196  double bandgap()
197  {
198  return 1.121; // use as reference value for all cell types
199 
200  /*
201  switch( Type )
202  {
203 
204  case Amorphous: // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Solar_cell
205  return 1.7;
206 
207  case CdTe: // http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Band_gap#Photovoltaic_cells
208  return 1.49;
209 
210  case CIS:
211  return 1.05; // Numerical Model of the Copper-Indium-Selenium(CIS) based Solar cell Performance by AMPS-1D (Amin, Tang, Sopian), IEEE
212 
213  case CIGS:
214  return 1.4; // Ref. as above, and higher than CIS, b/c of addition of gallium http://solar.calfinder.com/library/solar-electricity/cells/cell-materials/cis
215 
216 
217  case monoSi:
218  case multiSi:
219  default:
220  return 1.121;
221  }*/
222  }
223 
224  void guess()
225  {
226  // guess initial conditions (take into account module technology -based on heuristics)
227 
228  /*
229  // -------- original regressions - based on CEC database -----------
230  switch( Type )
231  {
232  case Amorphous: a = 0.0353 * Nser + 0.5222; break;
233  case CdTe: a = 0.0109 * Nser + 1.4112; break;
234  case CIGS: a = 0.019 * Nser + 0.3088; break;
235  case CIS: a = 0.0224 * Nser - 0.11; break;
236  case monoSi: a = 0.0272 * Nser - 0.0142; break;
237  case multiSi:
238  default:
239  a = 0.0252 * Nser;
240  }
241  */
242 
243 
244  // -------- regressions based on bootstrapping iteration 1 -----------
245  switch( Type )
246  {
247  case Amorphous: a = 0.029 * Nser + 0.5264; break;
248  case CdTe: a = 0.012 * Nser + 1.3565; break;
249  case CIGS: a = 0.018 * Nser + 0.3277; break;
250  case CIS: a = 0.021 * Nser + 0.0897; break;
251  case monoSi: a = 0.027 * Nser - 0.0172; break;
252  case multiSi:
253  default:
254  a = 0.0263 * Nser + 0.0212;
255  }
256 
257  if (a < 0.1) a = 0.1;
258  if (a > 10) a = 10;
259 
260  Il = Isc;
261 
262  Io = Isc*exp( -Voc/a );
263 
264  // put a "reasonable" limit on the initial guess value of Io
265  if (Io > 1e-9) Io = 1e-9;
266  if (Io < 1e-15) Io = 1e-15;
267 
268  //if ( Type == monoSi || Type == multiSi )
269  //Rs = ( a * log( (Isc-Imp)/Io ) - Vmp ) / Imp;
270  //else
271  // Rs = 0.3*(Voc - Vmp)/Imp;
272 
273  double Rs_scale, Rsh_scale;
274  switch( Type )
275  {
276  case Amorphous:
277  Rs_scale = 0.59;
278  Rsh_scale = 0.922;
279  break;
280  case CdTe:
281  Rs_scale = 0.46;
282  Rsh_scale = 1.11;
283  break;
284  case CIGS:
285  Rs_scale = 0.55;
286  Rsh_scale = 1.22;
287  break;
288  case CIS:
289  Rs_scale = 0.61;
290  Rsh_scale = 1.07;
291  break;
292  case monoSi:
293  Rs_scale = 0.32;
294  Rsh_scale = 4.92;
295  break;
296  case multiSi:
297  default:
298  Rs_scale = 0.34;
299  Rsh_scale = 5.36;
300  break;
301  }
302 
303 
304  //if ( Type == monoSi || Type == multiSi )
305  // Rsh = 100;// * Rs;
306  //else
307  // Rsh = Voc/(0.3*(Isc-Imp));
308 
309  //Rs_scale = 0.3;
310  //Rsh_scale = 1/0.3;
311 
312  Rs = Rs_scale * (Voc - Vmp)/Imp;
313 
314  if (Rs < 0.02) Rs = 0.02;
315  if (Rs > 60) Rs = 60;
316 
317  Rsh = Rsh_scale * Voc/(Isc-Imp);
318 
319  Adj = 0.0;
320 
321 
322 
323 
324  }
325 
326  void guess_ees()
327  {
328  // initial conditions specified in EES solver
329  a = 2 * Nser * 0.025;
330  Io = Isc * exp(-Voc/a);
331  Il = Isc;
332  Rs = ( a * log( (Isc-Imp)/Io ) - Vmp ) / Imp;
333  Rsh = 100;
334  }
335 
336  int sanity()
337  {
338  // ensure values are in "reasonable" ranges
339  if ( a < 0.05 || a > 15.0 ) return -1;
340  if ( Il < 0.5 || Il > 15.0 ) return -2;
341  if ( Io < 1e-16 || Io > 1e-7 ) return -3;
342  if ( Rs < 0.001 || Rs > 75.0 ) return -4;
343  if ( Rsh < 1.0 || Rsh > 100001.0 ) return -5;
344  if ( Adj < -100.0 || Adj > 100.0 ) return -6;
345  if ( Imp >= Isc ) return -7;
346 
347  double V, I, P;
348 
349  // make sure Pmp on curve is within 1 % of specified Pmp
350  V = Vmp;
351  I = module6par::current(V, Il, Io, Rs, a, Rsh, Imp );
352  P = V * I;
353  double Pmp = Vmp * Imp;
354  if ( fabs( (P-Pmp)/Pmp ) > 0.015 )
355  return -33;
356 
357  // make sure I @ open circut is basically zero (less than 1% of Imp)
358  V = Voc;
359  I = module6par::current(V, Il, Io, Rs, a, Rsh, Imp );
360  if ( fabs(I) > 0.015 * Imp )
361  return -44;
362 
363  // derivative of I/V curve should always be negative (because of numerical issues, could be 0)
364  double slope = max_slope( 0.015 * Voc, 0.98 * Voc );
365  if ( slope > 0 ) return -55;
366 
367 
368  return 0;
369  }
370 
371  double max_slope( double Vstart, double Vend )
372  {
373  if (Vend <= Vstart) Vend *= 1.01;
374 
375  double count = 0;
376  const int numPoints = 100;
377  double V, I;
378 
379  double deriv = 0;
380 
381  double Ilast = module6par::current(Vstart, Il, Io, Rs, a, Rsh, Imp);
382 
383  double dV = (Vend-Vstart) / numPoints;
384 
385  V = Vstart;
386  while (V <= Vend)
387  {
388  I = module6par::current(V, Il, Io, Rs, a, Rsh, Imp );
389  if (V > Voc) I = 0;
390  double d = ( I - Ilast ) / dV;
391  if (d > deriv) deriv = d;
392  Ilast = I;
393  V += dV;
394  count++;
395  }
396 
397  return deriv ;
398  }
399 
400  static double current(double Vmodule, double IL_ref,
401  double IO_ref, double RS,
402  double A_ref, double RSH_ref,
403  double I_mp_ref)
404  {
405  /*
406  5/21/08 - based on email from Nate 4/3/08
407 
408  V, !load voltage [volts]
409  IO_REF, !reverse saturation current at reference conditions [A]
410  A_REF, !modified ideality factor at reference conditions
411  IL_REF, !photocurrent at reference conditions [A]
412  IO_REF = reverse saturation current at reference conditions [A]
413  RS = !series resistance (constant)
414  RSH_REF = !shunt resistance at reference conditions
415  IMR = reference current at max. power [A]
416 
417  FUNCTION CURRENT5194(V,IMR,NSER,NPRL)
418  C Iterative solution for current as a function of voltage using
419  C equations from the five-parameter model. Newton's method is used
420  C to converge on a value. Max power at reference conditions is initial
421  C guess.
422  IMPLICIT NONE
423  IOLD = 0.0
424  V_MODULE = V/NSer
425 
426  C**** first guess is max.power point current
427 
428  INEW = IMR
429  DO WHILE (DABS(INEW-IOLD).GT.1.E-4)
430  IOLD = INEW
431  F = IL_REF-IOLD-IO_REF*(DEXP((V_MODULE+IOLD*RS)/A_REF)-1.0)-
432  & (V_MODULE+IOLD*RS)/RSH_REF
433  FPRIME = -1.-IO_REF*(RS/A)*DEXP((V_MODULE+IOLD*RS)/A_REF)-(RS/RSH_REF)
434  INEW = MAX(0.d0,(IOLD-(F/FPRIME)))
435  END DO
436  I = INEW !CURRENT FOR ONE MODULE
437 
438  END FUNCTION CURRENT5194
439 
440  */
441  double F=0, Fprime=0;
442  double Iold = 0.0;
443  double Inew = I_mp_ref;
444  int iter = 0;
445 
446  while (fabs(Inew - Iold) > 1.0e-5)
447  {
448  Iold = Inew;
449 
450  F = IL_ref - Iold - IO_ref *
451  (exp((Vmodule + Iold * RS) / A_ref) - 1.0) -
452  (Vmodule + Iold * RS) / RSH_ref;
453 
454  Fprime = -1.0 - IO_ref * (RS / A_ref) *
455  exp((Vmodule + Iold * RS) / A_ref) -
456  (RS / RSH_ref);
457 
458  Inew = MAX( double(0.0),(Iold-(F/Fprime)));
459 
460  if (++iter > 500) break;
461  }
462  return Inew;
463  }
464 
465  template< typename Real >
466  int solve( int max_iter, double tol,
467  notification_interface *nif = 0 )
468  {
469 
470  __Module6ParNonlinear<Real> solver( nif,
471  Vmp, Imp, Voc, Isc,
472  bVoc, aIsc, gPmp, bandgap(), Tref );
473 
474  Real _a = Real(a);
475  Real _Il = Real(Il);
476  Real _Io = Real(Io);
477  Real _Rs = Real(Rs);
478  Real _Rsh = Real(Rsh);
479  Real _Adj = Real(Adj);
480 
481  bool ok = solver.exec( _a, _Il, _Io, _Rs, _Rsh, _Adj, max_iter, tol, nif );
482 
483  a = to_double(_a);
484  Il = to_double(_Il);
485  Io = to_double(_Io);
486  Rs = to_double(_Rs);
487  Rsh = to_double(_Rsh);
488  Adj = to_double(_Adj);
489 
490  int err = sanity();
491 
492  if ( err == 0 && !ok ) return -99;
493  else return err;
494 
495  }
496 
497  template< typename Real >
498  int solve_with_sanity_and_heuristics( int max_iter, double tol,
499  notification_interface *nif = 0 )
500  {
501  guess();
502 
503  int err = solve<Real>( max_iter, tol, nif );
504 
505 
506  if ( err < 0 && (Type == Amorphous || Type == CdTe) )
507  {
508  // attempt decreasing 'a' and solving
509  int downattempt = 0;
510  while( err < 0 && ++downattempt <= 6 )
511  {
512  guess();
513  a /= (1 + downattempt*0.2); // divide down by 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8, 2.0, 2.2
514  if( downattempt > 4 ) Io /= 100;
515  err = solve<Real>( max_iter, tol, nif );
516  }
517 
518  // attempt increasing 'a' and solving
519  int upattempt = 0;
520  while( err < 0 && ++upattempt <= 6 )
521  {
522  guess();
523  a *= (1 + upattempt*0.2); // multiply up by 1.2, 1.4, 1.6, 1.8, 2.0, 2.2
524  if( upattempt > 4 ) Io /= 100;
525  err = solve<Real>( max_iter, tol, nif );
526  }
527  }
528  else if ( err < 0 && Type == multiSi )
529  {
530  guess();
531  Io /= 100;
532  Rsh /= 2;
533  err = solve<Real>( max_iter, tol, nif );
534  }
535 
536  double Isc_save = Isc;
537  int nattempt = 0;
538  while ( err < 0 && nattempt < 5 )
539  {
540  Isc *= 1.01;
541  guess();
542  err = solve<Real>( max_iter, tol, nif );
543  nattempt++;
544  }
545 
546  Isc = Isc_save;
547 
548 
549  return err;
550  }
551 
552 
553 };
554 
555 #endif
